title: Don't use DoubleTensor as default global type in common.py
body_html:
I have been bitten hard many times (again today) by the usage of global DoubleTensor in common.py

This is really hard to track and the consequences are severe: memory usage blows up and speed becomes horrible too. We should not use default tensor type as DoubleTensor in any module. If some test requires doubleTensor, then explicity use DoubleTensor in that particular test rather than global setting.
